none: media/user/SCRAPE/test/2021-04-i-love-rich/extracted/I Love Rich/01 Delilah Is A Lesbian
I Love Rich - I Love Rich
I Love Rich - I Love Rich

Originally ripped by Terminal Escape, posted on April 13, 2021 Description from Terminal Escape:
 Chicago's I LOVE RICH are, apparently and bizarrely, still an active band in 2021. Considering their roots as an insipid melodic punk power trio, it's genuinely difficult to imagine the experiment continuing (and evolving) for nearly thirty years...and yet here we are. Remember when grunge and punk bros started listening to Neil Young when he was on MTV with Pearl Jam? The guitarist here sounds like he was one of those bros, and it's a good ass sounding guitar. Picture a family tree that includes MUSCLE BITCHES and LUNKHEAD....I LOVE RICH is the lost cousin who moved to Skokie or some shit and you kinda forget about them until you talk to your aunt and she tells you what they're up to and you're like "oh shit - we have a cousin?!" Anyway, this came out in 1993. I LOVE RICH
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Xpe7BuGEFUI
